refnamediv.refpurpose: Extract public key from certificate and prepare it for use

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
public_key
public_key can be one of the following:
an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey instance a string having the format file://path/to/file.pem. The named file must contain a PEM encoded certificate/public key (it may contain both).
A PEM formatted public key.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey instance on success, or &false; on error.
